title: Shapes in Nature
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 38 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: Students are familiar with shapes in the classroom, but Shapes in Nature uses stunning photographs to show how shapes can also occur in the natural world. A simple, repetitive sentence accompanies the large illustration on each page and structures this text for early emergent readers.
reviewWords: circle, heart, oval, shape, spiral, square, star, triangle
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /h/ sound
grammar: Pronouns : Recognize and use the pronoun I
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word see
